channel.title: Grunpkscape [517] client problem
channel.description:
First of all am really sorry of asking alot of questions >_<.
Ok heres my problem I downloaded GRUNPKSCAPE client and source but I have noticed that when cleints do not ask for an ip you have to put it on src folder> loader.java and I say that he used a no-ip.biz and I made a host .no-ip.biz changed it on the loader.java and compile it in this case the compile is "build" and I start running the server and run the client but i doesen't works, what am I doing wrong? i miss something? what i need to do? :confused:
I really thanks all the people who have replied on my older posts you helped alot but the other soruce had some bugs that i didn't fix them :( Thanks! |Caldito| nice name huh? :|

item.title: Grunpkscape [517] client problem
item.dc:creator: @Caldito_Master Caldito Master
item.description:
@Caldito_Master wrote:

arturspkscape:

umm, go to the client, than src, and find Class68_Sub20_Sub15, change the ip there

I did that and still not working

Read full topic

First of all am really sorry of asking alot of questions >_<.

Ok heres my problem I downloaded GRUNPKSCAPE client and source but I have noticed that when cleints do not ask for an ip you have to put it on src folder> loader.java and I say that he used a no-ip.biz and I made a host .no-ip.biz changed it on the loader.java and compile it in this case the compile is “build” and I start running the server and run the client but i doesen’t works, what am I doing wrong? i miss something? what i need to do?
